Thiago-
	Are we talking existance or extinction? Samurai really existed, many 
of the tales are just tales but many are true.The samurai as a 
political class were abolished but they are not "extinct." There was 
quite a lot of discussion on this subject not long ago right here on 
this list. A lot of the influential families are still around but the 
power now resides elsewhere. The traditions and costume may yet be seen 
today but no one is living the life of a samurai...I am sure you have 
heard all this before.The archive, linked above, is a really great 
place to get info, and don't forget the gear!
-t
